item.description:
1.0.0

ğŸ“° Important News

  • ğŸ’¸ Reminder to support me & Loop by sponsoring the project
  • ğŸ’„ Can't donate? The next best way to support the project is to make some app icons for Loop!
  • ğŸŒ Localization: I will start requesting localizations for the next update so please let me know if you are interested in localizing Loop :)

âœ¨ New Features

  • âœ¨ #361 Completely new translucent settings window
  • âœ¨ #303 Set up localization infrastructure
  • âœ¨ #344 New website for release notes
  • âœ¨ #251 Ability to ignore mouse screen
  • âœ¨ #235 Save cycle keybind index
  • âœ¨ #317 Make window snapping less sensitive
  • âœ¨ #212 Don't activate Mission Control when window snapping
  • âœ¨ #298 Ability to animate window resizes when preview is disabled
  • âœ¨ #298 Window animations no longer require screen recording access
  • âœ¨ #378 Add summer/developer app icons
  • âœ¨ #379 Ability to ignore screen with mouse
  • âœ¨ #380 Reduce useless cycle/custom action creation click
  • âœ¨ #384 Ability to move cursor with window
  • âœ¨ #389 Improve window animations when window snapping
  • âœ¨ #390 Ability to translate window location

ğŸ Bug Fixes

  • ğŸ #299 Instant animation is not instant
  • ğŸ #347 Fix window being cropped to screen when restoring initial frames
  • ğŸ #95 Windows will now properly resize to bottom with window animations
  • ğŸ #350 Make window snapping work properly on secondary screens
  • ğŸ #314 Reduce Hyperkey conflicts
  • ğŸ #381 Make sure settings window buttons are themed properly

ğŸ¥³ Notable Mentions

  • ğŸ #296 Fix typo
  • ğŸ¨ #304 Reduce SwiftLint warnings
  • ğŸ¨ #370 Use SwiftFormat rather than SwiftLint
  • âœ¨ #387 Add Luminare as git submodule
